column3: Includes excise taxes on sales by certain of our foreign operations of $5,194 million, $5,645 million, and $4,797 million for the years ended December 31, 2022, 2021, and 2020.

Cost of materials and other for our Renewable Diesel segment is net of the blender’s tax credit on qualified fuel mixtures of $761 million, $371 million, and $288 million for the years ended December 31, 2022, 2021, and 2020, respectively.
